Description: The following statement contains a magic number: foreach (var edge in input)              {                  var parts = edge.Split();                  var from = int.Parse(parts[0]);                  var to = int.Parse(parts[1]);                  var cost = int.Parse(parts[2]);                    InitializeIfNeeded(graph' from);                  InitializeIfNeeded(graph' to);                    graph[from].Add(new Edge(from' to' cost));                  graph[to].Add(new Edge(to' from' cost));              }
